entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is trying to escape from the room. He is described as running and shouting desperately for an exit.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being present in the same room as Harry, giggling feebly when Harry says 'Harry — what — ?'

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being unconscious and present in the same room as Harry and Ron.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is mentioned as disappearing through a door on the other side of the room, leading back to the lifts. She is described as slamming the door behind her and causing the walls to rotate again.

entities.name: the circular black hall
entities.description: The circular black hall is mentioned as a location where Harry finds himself after wrenched open the door. It is described as having a door on the other side of the room, leading back to the lifts.

entities.name: the corridor
entities.description: The corridor is mentioned as a location that leads back to the lifts. It is described as being empty and torch-lit.

entities.name: the lifts
entities.description: The lifts are mentioned as a location that can be accessed through the corridor. They are described as clattering ahead of Harry when he runs.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are present in the same room, with Ron giggling feebly when Harry says 'Harry — what — ?'
Harry and Hermione are present in the same room, with Hermione being unconscious.
Bellatrix disappears through a door on the other side of the room, leading back to the lifts in the corridor.
Harry finds himself in the circular black hall after wrenched open the door.
The room seems to have been waiting for Harry to ask, and the door right behind him flies open, revealing the torch-lit and empty corridor.
Harry runs towards the lifts in the corridor, which are described as clattering ahead of him.
